'''Woodland Dream''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Sunshine Sprat]] with [[Albedo]]. The [[recipe]] for Sunshine Sprat is obtainable from Albedo during the [[The Second Experiment: The World]] quest of Princeps Cretaceus Chapter Act I: [[Traveler Observation Report]].

Woodland Dream increases all party members' [[Shield]] Strength by '''35'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
